title: Cyril Pedrosa - Three Shadows
description:
'Three Shadows'

First Second, 2007, 276 pages

Written and Illustrated by Cyril Pedrosa

Can you ever escape your fate?

Three shadows stand outside the house Ã¢â‚¬â€œ and Louis and Lise know why the spectral figures are there.  The shadows have come for Louis and LiseÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s son, and nothing anyone can do will stop them.  Louis cannot let his son die without trying to prevent it, so the family embarks on a journey to the ends of the earth, fleeing death. 

Poignant and suspenseful, Three Shadows is a haunting story of love and grief, told in moving text and sweeping black and white artwork by Cyril Pedrosa.
